name: JETBOUND (Beta)
description:
Run away from the giant cloud of death, or try and escape the facility as fast as you can!

Use a jetpack and grappling hook, wall run, or ride a zipline to pass obstacles!

Made in about 3 months.

Controls:

  • Use WASD to move.
  • Press space to jump.
  • Press left click to shoot.
  • Hold right click to aim.
  • Hold CTRL to slide.
  • Press E while aiming at a grapple spot to grapple.
  • Press E while near a zipline base to ride a zipline.

Assets/Art:

Enemy low poly model: https://blendswap.com/blend/6737

Sounds from Zapsplat.com

Jetpack sound and game music from Epidemic Sounds

Menu Theme:
